resources.string: Switch phone screen on/off with a swipe over the capacitive buttons
Set to "Direction dependent" to allow only a left-to-right swipe for turning on and a right-to-left swipe for turning off
Set the number of buttons that are needed to be swiped over for switching screen on/off
Enable to draw more power when connected to a PC USB port
Select to disable the capacitive button backlight
Select to enable the capacitive button backlight for Notification events
Switch nVidia SmartDimmer on/off (switching on saves battery life with less backlight and more contrast/colors, switching off should give brighter LCD backlight)
